entry.def: Czech means belonging or relating to the Czech Republic, or to its people, language, or culture.
A Czech is a Czech citizen, or a person of Czech origin.
Czech is the language spoken in the Czech Republic.

means.word_mean: 1. a native of inhabitant of the Czech Republic
2. a native or inhabitant of the former republic of Czechoslovakia
3. the Slavic language of the Czech people
1. of or relating to Czechoslovakia or its people or their language;
